title: Moderator
body: Can I get a moderator here?!?!

replies.body: Moderator here! What's the question/concern you have?
If this is about your removed thread, I would opine that the removal was correct. I would further guess that the chances of mods concluding that such removal was in error are zero.
You can, but it might be faster to use the discord.
for what so you can be toxic again like you was in your last thread calling people names because you got perma banned?
